sentences.en: ...a torn tendon in his right shoulder.
A scaffold, by contrast, mimics the structure of a healthy tendon.
sentences.cn: 相比之下, 支架则会模仿健康肌腱的构造.

sentences.en: A tendon consists of parallel fibres.
For more neck, back, vertebra, back, muscle tendon symptoms go far.
sentences.cn: 多用于颈 、 腰 、 椎 、 背 、 肌肉筋炎等症状.

sentences.en: From 1964 to 1982, 16 cases of achilles tendon rupture were encountered.
sentences.cn: 自1964～1982年治疗16例跟腱断裂伤.

sentences.en: He was running at full speed when a tendon snapped in his leg.
sentences.cn: 他正全速奔跑时,腿部的一条肌腱断裂了.

sentences.en: I think I have to align the tendon next week or something.
sentences.cn: 我想下礼拜我应该还是去做个复健还是什么的.

sentences.en: It's ox tendon with prawn eggs. It's specialty of restaurant.
sentences.cn: 这是虾子蹄筋, 是这家饭店的特色菜.

sentences.en: Many patients, once recovered from a tendon injury, will tear it again.
sentences.cn: 许多肌腱受伤的病人复原后, 肌腱都会再度裂伤.

sentences.en: Rupture tendon operation already 3 months, why to rain to ache?
sentences.cn: 跟腱断裂手术已经3个月了, 为什么一下雨就疼 呢 ?

sentences.en: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.cn: 她遭受这么严重的肌腱损伤，这实际上让她残废了。

sentences.en: The defect of Achilles tendon was 8 to 10 cm, to repair it.
sentences.cn: 跟腱缺损长度为8～10cm, 自身已无修复条件.

sentences.en: The following deals only with the methods of a tendon to bone.
sentences.cn: 下面将要介绍的仅仅是肌腱与骨的固定方法.

sentences.en: The methods of tendon suture are discussed in Chapter 63.
sentences.cn: 肌腱缝合方法将在63章介绍.

sentences.en: The vertical tendon had to be prestressed twice to ensure effective prestressing.
sentences.cn: 竖向预应力应两次张拉以保证有效预应力.

sentences.en: Whilst playing badminton, I ruptured my Achilles tendon.
sentences.cn: 打羽毛球时，我的跟腱撕裂了。

phrases.tran_cn: 预应力钢筋束，预应力筋腱

trans.tran_en: a thick strong string-like part of your body that connects a muscle to a bone
